title: Release the Spyce
overview: Release the Spyce follows Tsukikage, a group of ninja high school girls who gain power from spices and secretly go on various missions to stop crime and protect the city. Momo Minamoto, a girl with heightened senses and deductive abilities, is recruited to join Tsukikage and train under fellow member Yuki Hanz≈çmon. Together, Tsukikage battles against the evil organisation Moryo.
